meanings.sent1: The puzzle was multipiece, requiring many parts to be put together.
meanings.sent2: She bought a multipiece jigsaw puzzle to challenge herself.
meanings.sent3: The multipiece cake looked like a delicious challenge to eat!
meanings.sent4: His multipiece plan finally came together, revealing its complexity.
meanings.sent5: The multipiece toy set provided hours of entertainment for the children.

meanings.definition: A collection of separate pieces that form a whole
meanings.sent1: The furniture was a multipiece set, each item complementing the others.
meanings.sent2: She carefully assembled the multipiece model of the Eiffel Tower.
meanings.sent3: The multipiece of the puzzle seemed to be missing a crucial part.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a multipiece of a beautiful mosaic, each adding a unique color.
meanings.sent5: The artist displayed a stunning multipiece sculpture at the gallery.
